Description: Creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_LifeMagic.Spell_LifeStaff_DivineEmbrace.Radius]}m</font> radius area around an ally or a location on the ground that <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Heals</font> the target within for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_DivineEmbrace.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.\n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.LifeStaff_TouchOfLife.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.
Divine Embrace costs <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.LifeStaff_TouchOfLife_Mana_Upgrade.ManaCost]}</font> mana.

If your target is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> one additional ally within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">8m</font> for the same amount.

If the ally healed by Shared Struggle is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> another ally within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">8m</font> of that ally.

Create an area on the ground with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> radius that lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">12s</font>. Allies in the area are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_SacredGround.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage every second.\n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.LifeStaff_HealingWave.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Regenerate stamina <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_SacredGround_Upgrade.StaminaRate * 100]}%</font> faster and mana <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_SacredGround_Upgrade.ManaRate * 100]}%</font> faster while in Sacred Ground.

While allies are in Sacred Ground, they are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_SacredGround_Upgrade2.HealMod * 100]}%</font> more from all incoming healing.

You and all group members within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_LifeMagic.Spell_Ability_Lifestaff_SplashofLight.Radius]}m</font> are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_LifeStaff_SplashofLight.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.LifeStaff_HolyShield.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

For each ally <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healed</font> that is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health, you gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Lifestaff_SplashofLight_ManaOnLow.Mana * 100]}%</font> of your max mana.

Splash of Light removes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1 debuff</font> when it <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> an ally.
Life Staff's heavy attacks no longer consume <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">mana</font>.
Heavy attacks now remove <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1 debuff</font> when passing through an ally.

Light attacks now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_HealOnLight.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage when passing through an ally.

When you hit with a light attack, reduce Life Staff ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_CDROnLight.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

When you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> an ally below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health, Life Staff ability cooldowns are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_CDROnLow.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Can only be triggered once every {[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_CDROnLow.ActivationCooldown]}s.)</font>

When hit in battle, activate a healing aura for you and nearby friends in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4m</font> radius. The aura <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_AoeHealWhenHit.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_AoeHealWhenHit.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_AoeHealWhenHit_Timer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>

While holding a Life Staff, increase the amount of incoming <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healing</font> to all friendlies in your group by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.LifeStaff_IncreasedHealing_Passive.HealMod * 100]}%</font>.

When you hit with a heavy attack, gain a stacking <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_HealingBuffonBasic.HealScalingValueMultiplier * 100]}%</font> bonus to outgoing healing effectiveness for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_HealingBuffonBasic.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_HealingBuffonBasic.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>

When you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> an ally below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health, they are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Ultimate_Lifestaff_Healing.HealScalingValueMultiplier * 100]}%</font> more.

Shoot out a light projectile that grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]}s</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> an ally for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection_Heal.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> of weapon damage, and deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_nature_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage when it hits an enemy. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor)</font> \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.LifeStaff_OrbofLight.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

If Orb of Protection hits an ally, they gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">recovery</font> and are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection_HealoverTime.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage every second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection_HealoverTime.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

If you successfully <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> an ally with Orb of Protection, you also gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">recovery</font>.
When this projectile hits, it effects all allies within a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> radius.

Creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_LifeMagic.Spell_LifeStaff_DivineEmbrace.Radius]}m</font> radius area around an ally or a location on the ground that <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Heals</font> the target within for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_LightsEmbrace.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage + <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Ability_Lifestaff_LightsEmbrace.HealScalingValueMultiplier * 100]}%</font> more for each <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">life staff buff</font> on that target. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.LifeStaff_LightsEmbrace.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

When you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> a target with Light's Embrace, that target gains <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_GiveStam.Stamina]}</font> stamina.

When you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> a target with Light's Embrace, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_ManaPerBuff.Mana * 100]}%</font> of your max mana for each <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">buff</font> your target has.

When you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> a target with Light's Embrace, extend the duration of Life Staff <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">buffs</font> on that target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Ultimate_Lifestaff_Protection.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s</font>.

Shoot out a light projectile that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.LifeStaff_Beacon.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_nature_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage to enemies, attaches to its target and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> all allies in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_LifeMagic.Spell_Ability_Lifestaff_Beacon_AOE.Radius]}m</font> radius for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_Beacon.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage each second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10s</font>. \n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.LifeStaff_Beacon.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Beacon's area of effect radius is increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_LifeMagic.Spell_Ability_Lifestaff_Beacon_AOE_Upgrade.Radius]}m</font>.
Beacon lasts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5s</font> longer.

Allies in the Beacon AOE now gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

After a dodge, your <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">outgoing healing</font> is <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_HealingOnDodge.HealScalingValueMultiplier * 100]}%</font> more effective for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_HealingOnDodge.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
When you block a melee attack, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_ManaOnBlock.Mana * 100]}%</font> max mana.

Life Staff's basic attacks grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_FortifyOnBasic.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_FortifyOnBasic.BaseDuration]}s</font> when hitting an enemy. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor)</font>

If you have a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">buff</font>, all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">outgoing healing</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_HealingPerBuff.HealScalingValueMultiplier * 100]}%</font>.

When you get hit while below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_HasteWhenLow.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_HasteWhenLow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_HasteWhenLow_Timer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>
Increases mana regeneration for you and group members by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.LifeStaff_Mana_Regen.ManaRate * 100]}%</font>.

Life Staff buffs you grant last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[LifeMagicAbilityTable.Passive_Lifestaff_Protection_BuffDur.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%</font> longer.
